name: Escape from San Quentin - Remaster
description:
This game is a unofficial remaster of and old text-based adventure game with the same name that ran on an old ms-dos software for hearing impaired people.

In this game you have to escape from a prison using various items you find along the way.

It's a relatively short game due but it certainly improves on the orginal game experience.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Attack

E - Pick Items

Spacebar - Use Items

Original game Software:

http://intervox.nce.ufrj.br/dosvox/
